message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm keeping most of the cash!
I'll give you a decent share, but I'm keeping most of the pie
You're getting a bit more, but I'm still in the lead!
I'll give you a small taste, but I'm taking the majority
You're getting closer, but I'm not giving up the reins yet!
You're getting close, but I'm taking the lion's share this time!
You want it all? Fine, take it all, but I'm walking away!
